page: RT30019: Sci And Tech. Rubber And Rubber Like Materials

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introductory concepts of macromolecule. Introduction to different rubbers ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ their structures and related properties (Tg, crystallinity, viscoelastic effects), rubber vis-ÃÂÃÂ -vis other materials, Natural rubber. Manufacture of synthetic rubbers, Properties and characterization of rubbers (structural, mol wt, thermal, mechanical, electrical, optical). Compounding ingredients used in rubber (vulcanizing agents, accelerators, antioxidants, fillers, special purpose ingredients). Vulcanization of rubber (chemistry and technology). Mixing of rubber and blends. Physical and chemical testing of rubbers. Design of rubber compounds for particular end use. (Tyre, hose, belting, seal etc.). Manufacturing concepts of rubber products.
